## Builder.button() method

Adds a button control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
button(text: string, opts?: Partial<ButtonModel>): ButtonModel & Removable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | <code>string</code> | The button text |
|  opts | <code>Partial&lt;ButtonModel&gt;</code> | Additional options for the control |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ButtonModel & Removable`
